product_name: SmartWool PhD Run Zip T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: You don't need an advanced degree to recognize the advantages of working out in the SmartWool PhD Run Zip-T shirt. Merino wool and nylon blend helps maintain a comfortable temperature when you're on the move, wicking moisture to keep you comfortable without a chill. Fabric protects skin from harsh UV light with a UPF rating of 40. 8 in. zipper enables easy climate control. Strategically placed flatlock seams minimize chafing and increase comfort. Unlike traditional wool, SmartWool items do not itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Smartwool items are naturally antimicrobial, preventing the funk traditionally associated with standard workout wear. The semifitted SmartWool PhD Run Zip-T shirt for men is not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: You don't need an advanced degree to recognize the advantages of working out in the SmartWool PhD Run Zip-T shirt.
